attributes.action: Ban the production of fireworks with noise - a bang or also known as "report"
attributes.additional_details: As a child, I loved watching the fireworks. The colours, the patterns. Did I go and watch them for the sound they make? Absolutely not. I am petitioning to try and ban the loud unnecessary bang fireworks make. It is unrealistic to think they will be banned completely, and I do not want to take away the fun from families with small children. They should be a part of it like I once was. For those that don't have animals or pets, they may not understand the fear! Keep your lights! Ditch the sound!!
attributes.background:
Thousands are coming to fear the time of year when fireworks shake the foundations of our homes. Pets spend the whole evening quivering, shaking, hiding - some are even dying! This is pure fear!
Let's keep up with the times and adapt to the needs of our fury friends!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.

We have also published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
